CustomField.description: A formula field to check if enough time has passed for this to be eligible for a compliance review.
CustomField.formula: IsPrimarySnapshot__c && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Related_Advice__r.Advice_Status__c, "Suitability declined")) && Related_Advice__r.DateAccepted__c <= (DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()), 01) -1) && Related_Advice__r.DateAccepted__c >= IF( MONTH(TODAY()) = 1, DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 12, 01), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) - 1, 01))
CustomField.label: Eligible for compliance review
